name: Gombos Deep Cart Dart
description:
Gombos Deep Cart Dart

How deep into the Gombo mine can you get before your wits give out. Props to any who make it to the purple zone with it's groovin beats.

  • Development Tool: Unity
  • Programming: Brad Malcolm
  • Art: Curtis Winters
  • Sound/Music: Eric Robertson

*Game for Ludum Dare 2021.*
